description:
Lilac EDP 50ML - A Floral Symphony of Spring Elegance

Experience the enchanting allure of Lilac Eau de Parfum, a captivating fragrance that transports you to a blooming spring garden. This exquisite 50ML floral perfume captures the delicate essence of lilac flowers in their most magnificent bloom, creating an olfactory masterpiece that's both timeless and sophisticated. ðŸŒ¸âœ¨

The Story Behind Lilac EDP

This exceptional fragrance draws inspiration from the ancient symbolism of lilacs, which have represented renewal and first love throughout history. The perfumer spent years perfecting this formula to capture the elusive beauty of white musk paired with the delicate lilac flower. This new arrival has quickly become a favorite among fragrance connoisseurs who appreciate sophisticated floral compositions.

The Perfect Occasion

The Lilac Eau de Parfum is versatile enough for everyday wear yet special enough for memorable occasions. Its balanced projection makes it suitable for professional settings while its romantic character shines during intimate gatherings. The unique floral blend creates a signature scent that will become your personal trademark. ðŸŒ¸

Frequently Asked Question

How long does Lilac EDP last on the skin?

The Lilac EDP 50ML offers exceptional longevity compared to most floral fragrances. Thanks to its eau de parfum concentration (15-20% fragrance oils), it typically lasts 6-8 hours on the skin. The sandalwood and musk base notes act as fixatives, allowing the beautiful lilac heart to remain present throughout the wear. For maximum longevity, apply to pulse points and moisturized skin. âœ¨
short_description: Discover Lilac EDP 50ML, a captivating floral fragrance that perfectly captures spring's most beloved bloom. This sophisticated composition balances delicate lilac blossoms with fresh citrus top notes and a warm base of sandalwood and musk, creating an elegant signature scent for any occasion.
